p: Organotypic brain slice cultures were infected with 10 5 PFU of EV-D68 isolate NY, Fermon, Rhyne, 947, 949, 952, 953, or 956 or poliovirus type 1. Virus was allowed to adsorb to the slices for 1 h at 37°C. The inoculum was removed, and the slices were washed twice in 1× PBS. Infected slices were cultured in CCM for 96 h.
